question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. red bus
B. stop sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The red bus is in the foreground, occupying a large portion of the image and positioned directly in front of the camera, while the stop sign is further back on the right side of the road.
